title: Pastoring Mediating Institutions in the IDW (Intellectual Dark Web)
description:
The question of "lived experience" vs data has the culture paralyzed. We blithely appeal to one or the other as if "reality" is some picture we select instead of understanding the nuances between one conscious center and various principalities we negotiate imaginatively. 

The IDW leaders tend to speak in abstract terms about changing culture without having much experience with institutions that mold individual people and the mediating institutions which significantly shape people and hence the culture. 

Eric Weinstein Rebel Wisdom David Fuller IDW https://youtu.be/GGtWwln491U
Eric Weinstein Bret Weinstein Dark Horse Podcast https://youtu.be/XjOg-OP_69Y
Peter Thiel and Religion as the JPEG of Being https://youtu.be/HwM1bn1Ggi8
Bret Weinstein on Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/WigprYZPaLc
Glenn Loury on Reason https://youtu.be/gp4fg9PWuhM
Glenn Loury's story https://youtu.be/iZ1XWO3uTT8
Dominion Tom Holland https://amzn.to/2YJhjea

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
